titleStmt.title: This vvorlds folly Or A warning-peece discharged vpon the wickednesse thereof. By I.H.
titleStmt.author: I. H., fl. 1615.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iaggard for Nicholas Bourne, and are to bee sold at his shop at the south entry of the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the south entry of the Royal Exchange
